text: Stormarn is a district (Kreis) in Schleswig-Holstein, Germany. The capital is Bad Oldesloe. It is bounded by (from the north and clockwise) the districts of Segeberg and Ostholstein, the city of Lübeck, the district of Lauenburg, and the city-state of Hamburg. The river Trave runs through the district before entering the city of Lübeck. == Towns and municipalities == Independent towns Independent municipalities #Ahrensburg #Bad Oldesloe #Bargteheide #Glinde #Reinbek #Reinfeld #Ammersbek #Barsbüttel #Großhansdorf #Oststeinbek Ämter Ämter Ämter *1.
